abstract: The Belgian beer giant is in the early stages of preparing what could be a $44.6 billion offer for Anheuser-Busch, the maker of Budweiser beer, people briefed on the matter said Friday.
snippet: The Belgian beer giant is in the early stages of preparing what could be a $44.6 billion offer for Anheuser-Busch, the maker of Budweiser beer, people briefed on the matter said Friday.
lead_paragraph: The Belgian beer giant InBev is in the early stages of preparing what could be a $44.6 billion offer for Anheuser-Busch, the American maker of Budweiser beer, people briefed on the matter said Friday.

headline.main: InBev Said to Consider Bid for Anheuser-Busch
headline.print_headline: InBev Said to Consider Bid for Anheuser-Busch

byline.original: By Andrew Ross Sorkin and Michael J. de la Merced
